Detailed Description

contains input parameters for each deformable mirror.

Field Documentation

double DM_CFG_T::guard

extra DM actuator rings outside of aper.d

double DM_CFG_T::stroke

Stroke of DM.

OPD goes to stroke$

double DM_CFG_T::vmisreg

vertical misregistration

double DM_CFG_T::ht

height conjugation range

double DM_CFG_T::dx

actuator separation

double DM_CFG_T::offset

Center-most actuator offset from origin

  • =0 means there is a act on center.

  • 1/2 means no one in the center.

double DM_CFG_T::iac

Inter-Actuator Coupling coefficient.

double DM_CFG_T::histbin

The bin width for histogram.

int DM_CFG_T::histn

Number of bins in histogram.

int DM_CFG_T::hist

Compute histogram of commands of each actuator.

int DM_CFG_T::cubic

use cubic spline.

better than linear. need to specify iac

int DM_CFG_T::order

Order of the DM within telescope clear subaperture.

int DM_CFG_T::isground

Is this DM the ground DM (derived).

int DM_CFG_T::nscale

number of scale group for DM propagation cache.

(derived)

double* DM_CFG_T::scales

the scale for each scale group.

(derived)
